amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Section 3010 of division A, which would lower the current federal share of bicycle facility projects from 95 and 90 percent to 80 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to strike section 3010 of division A, which would lower the current federal share of bicycle facility projects from 95 and 90 percent to 80 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Welch to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Welch to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.
